DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect commercially available ferment dairy product contain probiotic ( 4 week , twice day ) improvement gastrointestinal well digestive symptom adult woman report minor digestive trouble among general population .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Fermented Dairy Product Gastrointestinal Well Being Adult Women
DOC.criteria: Female freeliving subject age 18 60 year . Subject body mass index 18 30 . Subject minor digestive symptom define screen questionnaire frequency digestive symptom . Subject normal stool frequency Subject diagnosis Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) functional bowel disease ( constipation , diarrhoeaâ€¦ ) Subject know organic disease , include inflammatory bowel disease , benign malign tumour intestine colon significant systemic disease Subject prescription medication digestive symptom antispasmodic , laxatives antidiarrheic drug Subject take antibiotic last 4 week Pregnant subject subject planning become pregnant study ; breastfeed subject . Subject know lactose intolerance immunodeficiency Subject know allergy product component ( milk protein example )
